SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.mbr_id, cg.cg_name, f.file_path, cg.cg_content, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, cg.cg_max_mbr_count, stl.ctl_level, ct.ct_num, ct.ct_name, cs.cs_num, cs.cs_status FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level stl USING(ctl_num) INNER JOIN challenge_status cs USING(cs_num) INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct USING(ct_num) INNER JOIN files f ON cg.cg_file_idx = f.file_idx ORDER BY cg_start_date DESC
LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_group_member WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode}
SELECT cg_num, ctl_num, cg_name, file_path, cg_content, cg_creation_date, cg_max_mbr_count, cg_start_date, cg_end_date, cg_like, cs_num, mbr_id, cs_reward_check FROM challenge_group
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge_group( cg_num, ctl_num, cg_name, cg_content, cg_creation_date, cg_max_mbr_count, cg_start_date, cg_end_date, cg_like, cs_num, mbr_id, cs_reward_check, cg_file_idx ) VALUES ( #{challengeCode}, #{challengeTopicLevelCode}, #{challengeName}, #{challengeContent}, CURDATE(), #{challengeMaxMember}, #{challengeStartDate}, #{challengeEndDate}, #{challengeGroupLike}, #{challengeStatusCode}, #{memberId}, #{challengeRewardCheck}, #{challengeFileIdx} )
INSERT INTO challenge_group_member ( cgm_num, cg_num, mbr_id, cs_num, cgm_date ) VALUES ( #{challengeMemberCode}, #{challengeCode}, #{challengeMemberId}, #{challengeStatusCode}, CURDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT cgm_num AS challengeMemberCode, cg_num AS challengeCode, mbr_id AS challengeMemberId, cs_num AS challengeStatusCode, cgm_date AS challengeParticipationDate FROM challenge_group_member WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode}
SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(ct_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS challengeTopicCode, ct_name AS challengeTopicName FROM challenge_topic
SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(ctl_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS challengeLevelCode, ctl_content AS challengeLevelContent FROM challenge_topic_level
SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(cs_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS challengeStatusCode, cs_status AS challengeStatusInfo FROM challenge_status
SELECT cs_num FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_status cs USING(cs_num) WHERE cg.cg_num = #{challengeCode} AND cg_num IS NOT NULL
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM challenge_group WHERE cg_name = #{challengeName} )
/* 챌린지 리스트 총 갯수 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_group

SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.cg_name, f.file_path, m.mbr_image, cg.mbr_id, ct.ct_name, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, ctl.ctl_level, ctl.ctl_content, cg.cg_max_mbr_count, cg.cg_content FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN `member` m USING(mbr_id) INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level ctl USING(ctl_num) INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct USING(ct_num) INNER JOIN files f ON cg.cg_file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode};
